benchmark_details.name: PowerPoint Task Completion (PPTC)
benchmark_details.overview: The PowerPoint Task Completion (PPTC) benchmark assesses LLMs' ability to create and edit PPT files based on user instructions. It contains 279 multi-turn sessions covering diverse topics and involves hundreds of instructions requiring multi-modal operations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure LLMsâ€™ task completion performance within the PowerPoint software.

data.source: Crowdsourced instructions crafted by professional data science engineers familiar with PowerPoint.
data.annotation: Crafted by crowd workers based on established principles and reviewed for clarity and relevance.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the ratio of correctly completed turns to total turns and correctly completed sessions to overall sessions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in completing user tasks within PowerPoint.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated by assessing instruction clarity and relevance, executing provided API sequences, and verifying goal achievement.
